headline.main: GEN. LIM STILL ACTIVE; Filipino Leader Says He Was Not Seriously Wounded

lead_paragraph: ON THE BATAAN PENINSULA, March 1 (U.P.) -- Brig. Gen. Vincente Lim, the first Filipino graduated from West Point and known as the "Grand Old Man of the Filipino Army," laughed today at Japanese radio reports that he had been seriously wounded.
abstract: Brig Gen V Lim on P I campaign
snippet: ON THE BATAAN PENINSULA, March 1 (U.P.) -- Brig. Gen. Vincente Lim, the first Filipino graduated from West Point and known as the "Grand Old Man of the Filipino Army," laughed today at Japanese radio reports that he had been seriously wounded....
